item.title: Knative cli with Cloud Run (managed)
item.description: A very limited hack to use Knative CLI cli to do basic operations on Cloud Run (managed) I was looking at the API calls yesterday to understand how GCP’s gcloud deploys and manages an app on Cloud Run. Cloud Run at the core used Knative so i figured “how hard is it to use knative’s on CLI to manage Cloud Run?”. Well, you can to a limited degree and with some hacks.
